landing.title: Update your CV in 1 minute
landing.subtitle: Application helps freelancers automatically update CV & Portfolio from new projects or Job Descriptions. Reduce manual editing time, increase professionalism.

landing.feature2Desc: Add new projects, AI automatically creates professional bullet points

landing.feature4Desc: Create beautiful online portfolio to showcase to clients
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of freelancers using Resumate to update their CVs

welcome.title: Welcome to Resumate! üéâ
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with creating and managing your professional CVs.

uploadCV.title: Upload Your CV
uploadCV.content: Start by uploading your existing CV (PDF or Word format). Our AI will automatically extract and organize all your information.

viewCV.title: View Your Parsed CV
viewCV.content: Once uploaded, you'll see your CV data beautifully organized. You can edit, duplicate, or export it anytime.

tailorJob.title: Tailor for Jobs
tailorJob.content: Customize your CV for specific job descriptions. Our AI will highlight relevant experience and optimize keywords.

export.title: Export Your CV
export.content: Export your CV in multiple formats: PDF (with templates), Word, or ATS-friendly text format.

portfolio.title: Create Portfolio
portfolio.content: Generate a beautiful online portfolio from your CV data and share it with potential employers or clients.

settings.title: Settings & Preferences
settings.content: Customize your experience: change language, enable dark mode, and manage your account.

allSet.title: You're All Set! üöÄ
allSet.content: Ready to create amazing CVs? Start by uploading your first CV or explore the features at your own pace.
